Author: roseofdeathh
Text: Thanks :) I will definitely have to try that, I'm so tired of my whole class looking at me b/c of my stomach so if I could get rid of it before class that would be a game changer.

Author: Letsnotbeangry
Text: Exhale, then take a good stretch over the back of a chair ( like sit on it and lean over the back).  I get the stomach noises too, and this really helps me.   It's mostly just air bubbling around in there, and you can stretch out to make it easier for it to pass.  If I  stretch that part, I get huge gurgles, then nothing for a while.  Caution:  this process may illicit a burp or a fart.  Be prepared! :)
